thread.title: Kangana Ranaut turns designer, brings global trends on Indian runway
thread.title_full: Kangana Ranaut turns designer, brings global trends on Indian runway - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: Kangana Ranaut turns designer, brings global trends on Indian runway
text:
After giving a new definition to fashion in her films and red carpet appearances, Kangana Ranaut , has now turned designer for a limited edition collection called 'Marquee' for fashion label, Vero Moda to create a collection that reflects her own style sensibility.*Kangana Ranaut*
There are five broad themes -- Dandelion ... Â»
